title: Mr.and Mrs. Hay the Horse by Ahlberg, Allan ( Author ) ON Mar-26-1981, Paperback
description: Mr and Mrs Hay are a horse! Every day they climb into their horse suit (she's the back, he's the front) and perform at the circus. But as their children Henry and Henrietta grow up, their galloping parents begin to embarrass them.
author: Allan Ahlberg
